item.title: Youtube Reseracher Needed - Upwork
item.description:
As a business-focused content creator, I need a skilled researcher who is familiar with the YouTube platform to help me with a project.

The pay is $150 per week. This is the starting rate and will increase for someone who takes this seriously.

Key Responsibilities:
- Conduct focused research on YouTube to find small channels that have recently published videos which have gained significant viewership within the last 30 days. This will help me to understand what type of content is gaining traction in my current market

Example: YT channel with 1.5k subs and average video views of 150 but then has a business video with 5k views.

Ideal Candidate:
- Experienced in conducting in-depth YouTube research, especially in relation to video trends and competitors.
- Familiar with tools and methods for advanced YouTube channel and video analysis.
- Strong analytical skills to identify relevant data and patterns from the research.
- Excellent communication skills to present findings clearly and concisely.

This project requires a freelancer who is capable of providing me with detailed insights into specific content trends on YouTube, which will help me to make informed decisions for my own content strategy.

This is for 2 channels. One is for sales content (examples: how to get better at sales or how to improve your closing rate) the other is for business oe ecommerce content. Whichever is more popular (examples: how to start a service based business)

Only bids that are for $150 will be considered because otherwise you did not read the scope of work.

I need 12 - 15 results per channel so 24 - 30 results total. The deliverable is an spread sheet with Channel name, video link, video title and keywords (if there are any)

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 18, 2024 17:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Marketing, Research & Strategy, Market Analysis, Online Market Research
Skills: YouTube Marketing, Research & Strategy, Market Analysis, Online Market Research
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking for video creator / editor for YouTube channel - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a video editor who thrives on adding a splash of fun and a dash of humor to your projects? We’re launching a YouTube channel focused on the fascinating backstories behind some of the biggest businesses and brands, giving them a fun twist. We’re looking for a creative video editor to join our team on a long-term basis, and amp up the entertainment value of our content.

Did you know Samsung originally started off by selling dried fish? Ever wondered how Crocs turned ugly shoes into a fashion product? or how a $35 logo turned into one of the most recognized logos in the world? These are some of the fascinating stories we would like to share on our channel.

Responsibilities:

- Create 10–14 minute videos in line with the provided voice over file, using stock footage, archival footage, clips from movies or ads and even memes, ensuring the final result is engaging and fun.
- Employ a creative mix of cuts, transitions, graphics, and special effects to enhance the storytelling and inject humor into business topics.
- Contribute ideas for making content more engaging, perhaps through animated elements, comedic timing in edits, or unexpected visual surprises.

What We Offer:

- The opportunity to join a dynamic team that’s passionate about breaking the mold of traditional business content.
- Flexible work hours that accommodate your lifestyle as a freelancer.
- A platform where your creative edits can reach and delight a large audience.

The $1000 contract is just a placeholder as this will be a long-term contract worth much more on the long run.

We would like to start out with a 2-minute video test to make sure we’re a good fit before we go ahead with the full videos. So please send a quote for the 2-minute test.

If this sounds like the perfect gig for you, please send samples of your work. We’re excited to see what you can bring to our channel!

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 18, 2024 16:54 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Video, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: YouTube Video, Video Editing, Video Production
Country: Spain
click to apply

item.title: LinkedIn Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who specializes in creating engaging content for LinkedIn. The ideal candidate has experience in editing videos specifically for LinkedIn and understands the platform's unique requirements. As a LinkedIn Video Editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing videos to maximize their impact on the platform. This includes optimizing video length, adding captions or subtitles, and ensuring high-quality visuals and audio. We are seeking someone with a creative eye, strong attention to detail, and the ability to deliver projects on time.
    Required skills:
    - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro)
    - Strong understanding of LinkedIn's video format and best practices
    - Ability to optimize videos for different screen sizes and orientations
    - Experience adding captions and subtitles to videos
    - Knowledge of basic animation techniques for enhancing videos
    - Attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality work under tight deadlines

    If you are passionate about creating impactful videos for LinkedIn and have the necessary skills to deliver exceptional results, we would love to hear from you.

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 18, 2024 16:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Education, Video Intro & Outro
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Education, Video Intro & Outro
Country: Israel
click to apply

item.title: Actor needed for 2 Short Social Media Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We're a start up looking for an actor to make 2 short social media videos for us. They have a few lines in them.

You've probably seen the trends on social media right now where there's a  funny "hook" video to get people's attention and then it splices into the actual video for the company. The video we need you to film will be after the hook.

The first video will require flour to be thrown onto the actor then deliver a few short lines.

The second video will require to the actor to roll off of a couch then deliver a few lines.

Please be US Based so we can send our product to you for the videos.

item.title: video editor for food vlogging channel on YouTube - Upwork
item.description:
Please read the description so you don't waste your time or ours.

Here are the requirements:

1. Must edit on Adobe premiere pro only

2. Must be able to share project file if asked

3. Must have a good internet connection (80gb footage will be asked to download in a few hours)

4. Must have a good PC/Laptop in order to edit extensive amounts of footage

5. Must have a good PC/Laptop so no time is wasted during exporting and quality shall not be dropped

6. Must be able to deliver each video in 48 hours maximum

7. Must be URDU speaking in order to understand the creator's language.


Here is some information about the job:

The agency you'll be working for is masolabs(dot)com

The YouTuber you'll editing videos for is Fazal Sharif (search it up on YouTube)

Here are the mistakes our last editor which was the reason we are not going to hire him for long term, so kindly avoid these mistakes:

1. editing was vvv slow
2. Cuts swere not proper
3. Basic editing techniques were not implemented
4. Colors were not vibrant in editing
5. Sound effects were out of date
6. Over all while watching the videos it was getting really boring
7. There was no creativity in edit
8. Kindly edit in Premiere pro only
9. The transitions used were way too basic and boring

We want videos edited in a way that the viewer should be hooked at all time

The editor must know how to edit the video in a fast pace so that the viewer doesn't get bored

The editor should use sound effects properly to keep the viewer engaged

More instructions will be provided in inbox

The first milestone will be a video which has over 70gb of footage and the video needs to be done within 48 hours, so kindly only apply if you can make this happen

Budget: $120
Posted On: June 18, 2024 16:32 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro

item.ns0:encoded:
Please read the description so you don't waste your time or ours.

Here are the requirements:

1. Must edit on Adobe premiere pro only

2. Must be able to share project file if asked

3. Must have a good internet connection (80gb footage will be asked to download in a few hours)

4. Must have a good PC/Laptop in order to edit extensive amounts of footage

5. Must have a good PC/Laptop so no time is wasted during exporting and quality shall not be dropped

6. Must be able to deliver each video in 48 hours maximum

7. Must be URDU speaking in order to understand the creator's language.


Here is some information about the job:

The agency you'll be working for is masolabs(dot)com

The YouTuber you'll editing videos for is Fazal Sharif (search it up on YouTube)

Here are the mistakes our last editor which was the reason we are not going to hire him for long term, so kindly avoid these mistakes:

1. editing was vvv slow
2. Cuts swere not proper
3. Basic editing techniques were not implemented
4. Colors were not vibrant in editing
5. Sound effects were out of date
6. Over all while watching the videos it was getting really boring
7. There was no creativity in edit
8. Kindly edit in Premiere pro only
9. The transitions used were way too basic and boring

We want videos edited in a way that the viewer should be hooked at all time

The editor must know how to edit the video in a fast pace so that the viewer doesn't get bored

The editor should use sound effects properly to keep the viewer engaged

More instructions will be provided in inbox

The first milestone will be a video which has over 70gb of footage and the video needs to be done within 48 hours, so kindly only apply if you can make this happen

item.title: [Newark, NJ]: 90-second - 2-min promotional video featuring small business owner - [$500] - Upwork
item.description:
This short video (1:30 - 2:00 minutes in length) is for a small business that will be featured on Honeycomb Credit's investment platform. The business is raising investment capital through Honeycomb Credit and this video is critical in telling the story of the business and how they’re looking to grow. It will include a brief interview with the business owner (questions provided) as well as some b-roll within the location. We are also looking to receive 5-10 high-quality photos of the business owner and their products. This project features a local business.

Looking to schedule the shoot for sometime in the upcoming 2.5 weeks. We pay a $500 flat fee at the conclusion of the project. If this experience is beneficial for both parties, we would reach out with future job postings in the area.

Google Honeycomb Credit to check out our website!


Budget: $500
Posted On: June 18, 2024 16:31 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Promotional Video, MP4, Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Photography
Skills: Promotional Video, MP4, Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Photography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
